
[![](https://mermaid.)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#)

```ssh
classDiagram
    Destiny "one" -- "many" Activity
    Activity "one" -- "many" Price
    Activity "one" -- "many" Description
    Price "many" -- "one" Coin_type
    Description "many" -- "one" Language
    class Destiny {
        +integer: id
        +string: name
        +string: image_thumbnail
        +text: url
        +datetime: date_created
        +datetime: date_updated
        +getCountTotalActivity(id) int
    }
    class Activity {
        +integer: id
        +text: url
        +integer: discount
        +datetime: discount_date
        +datetime: date_created
        +datetime: date_updated
        +getPrice(activity_id) array
        +getDescription(despription_id) array
    }
    
    class Price {
        +integer: id
        +integer: value
        +integer: type_value
        +integer: activity_id
        +integer: coin_type_id
        +datetime: date_created
        +datetime: date_updated
    }
    class Coin_type {
        +integer: id
        +string: name
        +string: tag
        +datetime: date_created
        +datetime: date_updated
    }
    class Description{
        +integer: id
        +text: value
        +text: short_value
        +integer: language_id
        +datetime: date_created
        +datetime: date_updated
    }
    class Language {
        +integer: id
        +string: name
        +string: short_name
        +integer: status
        +datetime: date_created
        +datetime: date_updated
    }
```
